Headline: #3 King Drive, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, and #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 3, 147, 151 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express,  and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 146 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan, near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train at Jefferson Park. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Canal
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Halsted, Archer, Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cermak, Halsted, Archer, Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Canal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore/54th
ShortDescription: SB 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park  buses are temporarily rerouted via 53rd, South Shore, 54th, Hyde Park, and 55th due to, street blockage near South Shore/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via53rd, South Shore, 54th, Hyde Park, and 55th due to, street blockage near South Shore/54th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
